text: CBS News poll: Gender gap, enthusiasm, economy make for tight Harris-Trump race on Democratic convention eve  —  When Kamala Harris became the Democratic presidential nominee, the party saw a major surge in enthusiasm from its voters.  It pulled the party into an effectively even race …
